cms.query.QueryText: MERGE INTO CMS_ModuleUsageCounter AS T USING (VALUES (@Name)) AS S (CounterName) ON T.ModuleUsageCounterName = S.CounterName WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET ModuleUsageCounterValue = ModuleUsageCounterValue + 1 WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (ModuleUsageCounterName, ModuleUsageCounterValue) VALUES (CounterName, 1);
